lead_paragraph: The testimony came at the trial of Jeffrey Conroy, who is accused of a hate crime in the death of an Ecuadorean immigrant in Patchogue.
snippet: The testimony came at the trial of Jeffrey Conroy, who is accused of a hate crime in the death of an Ecuadorean immigrant in Patchogue.

headline.main: Blood on Defendant’s Knife Was Victim’s, Scientist Says
headline.seo: Scientific Testimony in Patchogue Stabbing Case
headline.print_headline: Blood on Defendant’s Knife Was Victim’s, Scientist Says
